channel.title: Posts on Art into Science
channel.description: Recent content in Posts on Art into Science

item.title: New ACoD website!
item.description: Art into Science, the conference with an acronym that makes no sense, will be back in 2023! This new website will make it easier for anyone to contribute by submitting PRs to this repository.
item.content:
Art into Science, the conference with an acronym that makes no sense, will be back in 2023!

This new website will make it easier for anyone to contribute by submitting PRs to this repository.
